rules_text:
{W}{U} RESILIENCE Young warriors attack early before returning to guard the tribe.
{U}{B} SACRIFICE Life is harsh. Survive where others don’t.
{B}{R} TOOLCRAFT Show your strength by creating a steady stream of tokens.
{R}{G} EQUIPMENT Sharpen your tools for the hunt and bring down your foe.
{G}{W} CARD TYPES Gather cards of many types to broaden your options.
{W}{B} AURAS Great beasts are hunted for their hides, their tusks, and your victory.
{B}{G} HUNTERS The many hands of your Hunter creatures bring down large prey.
{G}{U} COLORLESS Ancient tools and tribal magic power your spells.
{U}{R} FEROCIOUS Might makes right with creatures with power 4 or greater.
{R}{W} WEENIES Base power 2 or less is no obstacle when you works together.
